sourcesContent:
Rent Details

Property: {{ rentDetails.property }}

Rent Amount: {{ rentDetails.rentAmount | currency:'NOK' }}

No rent details found.

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { RentService } from '../rents/rents.service'; // Update the path @Component({ selector: 'app-rentdetails', templateUrl: './rentdetails.component.html', styleUrls: ['./rentdetails.component.css'] }) export class RentDetailsComponent implements OnInit { rentDetails: any; // Replace 'any' with the actual type of your rent details constructor( private route: ActivatedRoute, private rentService: RentService // Inject RentService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { // Retrieve rentId from the route parameters const rentIdParam = this.route.snapshot.paramMap.get('rentId'); if (rentIdParam !== null) { const rentId = +rentIdParam; // Call the method to fetch rent details this.fetchRentDetails(rentId); } else { console.error('Rent ID is null. Unable to fetch rent details.'); } } private fetchRentDetails(rentId: number): void { // Use RentService to get rent details by ID this.rentService.getRentById(rentId).subscribe( (rentDetails) => { this.rentDetails = rentDetails; }, (error) => { console.error('Error fetching rent details:', error); } ); } }
